QuestData.Title: Battling the Elements
QuestData.Description: Snorri was once the pride of our nation. A mighty warrior, many an enemy fell to his club.$b$bWe honor him, though he's no longer what he once was. Age has taken its toll, dulling his senses and sapping his strength. Still, he remains as proud as ever, never missing an opportunity to join a battle.$b$bSpeaking of battle, we're cooling Fjorn's anvil so it can be taken home. The remaining fire revenants are putting up some resistance. Help Snorri relive his glory days, $r. Guide him against this enemy.
QuestData.LogDescription: Njormeld wants you to accompany Snorri to Fjorn's anvil and help him kill 10 Seething Revenants.
QuestData.CompletionText: Were you able to lead Snorri to another victory, $c?
QuestData.RewardText: An honorable performance, $r. I shall inform the king of your assistance.$b$bThe anvil is nearly cool enough. I shall see you in Dun Niffelem soon.
